mapper.insert: insert into member1 (memId, nickName, memPassword, memName, memBirth, memGender, memAddress, memTel, memEmail, memPhoto) value (#{memId}, #{nickName}, #{memPassword}, #{memName}, #{memBirth}, #{memGender}, #{memAddress}, #{memTel}, #{memEmail}, #{memPhoto});
mapper.select: select count(*) from member1 where memId=#{id}
select count(*) from member1 where nickName=#{nickName}
select * from member1 where memId=#{param1} and memPassword=#{param2}
